@metadata.description: Message documentation for translators. This file uses the special 'qqq' language code which doesn't correspond to a real language.

login.title: Title of the login page/form.
login.username: Label for the username input field.
login.password: Label for the password input field.
login.rememberMe: Label for the 'keep me logged in' checkbox. Extends session duration.
login.submit: Text on the login submit button.
login.forgotPassword: Link text to the password reset page. Should be phrased as a question.
login.noAccount: Text asking if user doesn't have an account. Followed by a 'create one' link.
login.createOne: Link text to create a new account. Follows 'noAccount' text.

passwordReset.title: Title of the password reset page.
passwordReset.usernameLabel: Label for username field on password reset form.
passwordReset.emailLabel: Label for email field on password reset form.
passwordReset.hint: Help text explaining what to enter for password reset. Mention that either username OR email can be used.
passwordReset.submit: Text on the password reset submit button.
passwordReset.successMessage: Message shown after password reset request. IMPORTANT: For privacy, this message is always shown regardless of whether the account exists. Do not change the wording to reveal account existence.

createAccount.title: Title of the account creation page.
createAccount.subtitle: Subtitle/tagline for account creation. Should encourage joining.
createAccount.emailLabel: Label for optional email field. Include '(optional)' in translation.
createAccount.submit: Text on the account creation submit button.

settings.title: Title of the user settings/preferences page.
settings.display: Tab name for display settings (themes, text size).
settings.epr: Short name for Enhanced Password Reset feature.
settings.eprDescription: Description of what Enhanced Password Reset does. Explain that it requires both username AND email for password reset.
settings.save: Text on the save settings button.

theme.auto: Name for automatic theme (follows system preference).

common.termsOfUse: Link text to terms of use/service.
common.loading: Text shown while content is loading.

errors.invalidCredentials: Error shown when username or password is wrong. Do not specify which one is wrong for security.
errors.accountLocked: Error shown when account has been locked by administrator.
errors.usernameRequired: Validation error when username field is empty.
errors.passwordRequired: Validation error when password field is empty.
errors.passwordMismatch: Validation error when password and confirmation don't match.
errors.usernameTooShort: Validation error when username is too short. Minimum is 3 characters.
errors.passwordTooShort: Validation error when password is too short. Minimum is 8 characters.
errors.invalidEmail: Validation error for invalid email format.
errors.networkError: Error shown when network request fails. Should suggest retrying.
